name: Ali Karimi

structured_info.background: Born November 8, 1978, in Karaj, Iran, Ali Karimi is a highly decorated Iranian footballer widely known as 'The Iranian Maradona'. He was named Asian Footballer of the Year in 2004. He faced a ban from the national team in 2008 following criticism of the IRIFF.

summary: Ali Karimi is a prominent Iranian midfielder who had a successful career playing for numerous clubs, including Persepolis, Bayern Munich, and the Iranian national team - notably participating in the 2006 FIFA World Cup. He is considered one of Iran's greatest footballers.
